problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,∠ABC=60°,AB=BC=4cm,点M,N分别在边BC,CD上,且∠MAN=60°,则四边形AMCN的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, ∠ABC = N_0, AB = BC = N_1, points M and N are on edges BC and CD respectively, and ∠MAN = N_2, then the area of ​​the quadrilateral AMCN is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接AC,∵∠B=60°,∴∠BAD=120°,∵∠MAN=60°,∴∠BAM=∠CAN,∴△ABC为等边三角形,∴AB=AC,∴△ABM≌△ACN,∴四边形AMCN的面积等于平行四边形面积的一半．∵AB=4cm,∴BC边上的高为2√{3},S~菱形ABCD~=4×2√{3}=8√{3}∴四边形AMCN的面积等于\frac{1}{2}×8√{3}=4√{3}．故选:A．
